title: Ransomware Activity on Apache Servers
description: Multiple instances of ransomware infections targeting misconfigured Apache servers in Asia-Pacific region.

title: Credential Stuffing Attack on Banking Portals
description: Detected automated login attempts on several banking portals using breached credentials.

title: New Malware Variant: RedTiger
description: RedTiger targets Linux systems using SSH brute force and installs reverse shells.

title: Phishing Campaign via QR Codes
description: Attackers are using QR codes in phishing emails to bypass traditional email filters.

title: CVE-2024-11478 Exploitation in Wild
description: Proof-of-concept code for a critical privilege escalation vulnerability in kernel (CVE-2024-11478) is now publicly available.
